trend_summary: Across the series, cropland expands westward early on, while forestry clear-cuts migrate east and central. Later frames show partial reforestation of abandoned plots, but no noticeable increase in settlement. Built-up footprints stay tiny; land use oscillates mainly between agriculture and timber harvest.
notable_changes: Expansion of rectangular cropland blocks in the north-west during the first two images.
Emergence of fresh logging clear-cuts within central and south-eastern forests.
Several previously tilled fields revert to green cover, indicating regrowth or pasture shift.
Overall forest edge pushes back and forth but maintains dominance over half the area.
Road network and small village core remain static, with no new urban clusters.
